channel.title: Tree chart examples on chartexample.com
channel.description: Recent content in Tree chart examples on chartexample.com

item.title: Tree chart D3 example
item.description: function makeTree() { //data set const data = { name: 'root', color: '#ABDDA4', children: [ {name: 'child 1', color: '#5E4FA2'}, { name: 'child 2', color: '#FDAE61', children: [ {name: 'child 4', color: '#3288BD'}, {name: 'child 5', color: '#66C2A5'} ] }, { name: 'child 3', color: '#E6F598', children: [ {name: 'child 6', color: '#FEE08B'} ] } ] } // selecting root element for plot const svg = d3.select('#chart') // setting cursor style .
